historyPage.noDataYet: No measurements have been recorded yet

tutorial.welcomeDescription:
In this short tutorial, we will explain how the application works and what kind of permission we will require from your part if you choose to opt in to metrics collection. 
 
 Press Next to continue.
tutorial.explanationDescription:
This application will help your mobile network provider understand your end-user experience by periodically collecting network quality metrics, such as signal strength, bandwidth and latency. 
 
 You can opt out at any time, and no metric will be collected until you opt in again.
tutorial.permissionDescription:
The app will require you to grant permissions for making phone calls to measure the signal strength, and precise location to map your network information to a geographic area. 
 
 For the app to work in the background you also need to set location access as "all the time" in the settings.
